ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8897, CONF:10492 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.60"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8872)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8873)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="48768-6" Payment Sources (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:8876)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8874)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:8875)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship (CONF:8878, CONF:8879, CONF:15528)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Policy Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.61)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sequenceNumber/@value (CONF:8973) (CONF:8973)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8872)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8873)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8874)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="48768-6" Payment Sources (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:8876)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:8875)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship (CONF:8878, CONF:8879, CONF:15528)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Policy Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.61)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sequenceNumber/@value (CONF:8973) (CONF:8973)

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <act xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd" classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.60"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="806558256"/> <code code="48768-6" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Payment Sources"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> <entryRelationship> <act classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.61"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1448545348"/> <code codeSystemName=""/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> <performer typeCode="PRF"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.87"/> <assignedEntity> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.110" codeSystemName="HL7RoleClass"/> </assignedEntity> </performer> <performer typeCode="PRF"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.88"/> <time> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </time> <assignedEntity> <code code="GUAR" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.111" codeSystemName="RoleCode"/> </assignedEntity> </performer> <participant typeCode="COV"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.89"/> <time> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </time> <participantRole> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.111" codeSystemName="RoleCode"/> </participantRole> </participant> <participant typeCode="HLD"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.90"/> <time> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </time> <participantRole/> </participant> <entryRelationship typeCode="REFR"/> </act> </entryRelationship> </act>
